values:
im stuck in endless time replaying the things weve said
breaking my heart all over again.
to bad i just cant rewind and play it out, change the ending.
i guess ill just spend this endless night deing inside
letting my pain show thru my tears down my cheek, they hold loss for you.
to bad i cant rewind, im stuck in endless time.

2-11-05

you hurt me isnt that a fact, to late dont look back.
the past is in the past to bad you were suck an ass
love is great love is grand but you get hurt in the end
heres a letter with all my pain i shall mail to you the next day. take it or throw it away, this is the end of the day.
light is fading from my eyes, carried with my tears down my face, tempt me and i might do the deed, let my life flow to the gound down by my feet. lying in my own blood dieing with these sorrows.
